definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: heifer, cow;—abs. ´[[פ]] Is 11:7 +; sf. [[פָּרָתוֹ]] Job 21:10; pl. [[פָּרוֹת]] Ge 32:16 +, [[פָּרׂת]] Ge 41:26; cstr. [[פָּרוֹת]] Am 4:1; —as gift Ge 32:16; in Pharaoh's dream Ge 41:2, Ge 14:3, Ge 14:3 + 8 t. 41; drawing cart 1Sa 6:7, 1Sa 6:12, 1Sa 6:14 + [[עָלוֹת]] ´[[פ]] v7.10 cows giving suck,,milch cows; ´[[פ]] calving Job 21:10, grazing Is 11:7; [[אֲדֻמָּה]] ´[[פ]] red heifer Nu 19:2 cf. v:Nu 19:5, v:Nu 19:6, v:Nu 19:9, v:Nu 19:10; sim. of stubbornness Ho 4:16; [[פָּרוֹת הַבָּשָׁן]] Am 4:1, fig. of luxurious woman.
